long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
URVA: Empowering Your Field Force with Seamless Management

URVA is a comprehensive field force management app designed to streamline your workforce operations, available for Android devices. With URVA, your field personnel can efficiently handle tasks while staying connected to your office through the power of the Internet. No more unnecessary visits to the office for information – everything you need is at your fingertips, synced effortlessly on the URVA cloud platform.

Why Choose URVA for Your Field Force:

1. Effortless Task Synchronization:

Create customized task templates for your mobile workforce.
Easily assign tasks to your team using your computer or portable device.
Tasks are seamlessly delivered to your Android device, even on 2G networks, with support for 3G/4G and WiFi.
Complete tasks on the go and send them back to the headquarters.
Tasks can be Approved, Disapproved, or Resent based on quality and completeness.
2. Fully Mobile and Feature-Rich:

Utilize your device's sensors and features for enhanced efficiency.
Capture images using the built-in Camera, supporting both regular and selfie modes.
Ensure task authenticity by capturing pictures directly within the app.
Gather customer/client signatures directly on the device.
Attach a Bluetooth Printer for on-the-spot receipts and invoices.
Upcoming feature: Accept credit/debit card payments through URVA.
3. Enhanced Workforce Control:

Track your team's location on a Google Maps interface for optimal task allocation.
Monitor battery life and weather conditions for better workforce management.
Customize tracking intervals for improved accuracy.
Prioritize tasks to boost productivity.
Access up to a year's worth of tracking history for comprehensive insights.
4. Robust and User-Friendly:

URVA features an offline mode for remote locations; sync data once back online.
Initiate tasks with a simple press of the "Start" button.
Complete tasks by pressing "Finish"; options to Hold, Pause, or Discard tasks are available.
Dial clients/customers directly from the app.
Seamless navigation within URVA eliminates the need for external mapping apps.
Integrated Barcode Scanner for convenient data collection.
Easily reference finished tasks for future needs.
5. Team Management at Your Fingertips:

Send messages and alerts to teams or individuals, ensuring clear communication.
All communication is recorded for future reference.
URVA acts as your professional communication tool.
6. Future-Ready and Feature-Packed:

URVA continually evolves with regular feature updates.
